title: Hydrothermal coliquefaction of anaerobic digestate with polyphenolic extracts from agricultural byproducts producing nearly nitrogen-free biocrude oil
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4533-4549
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00762J, Paper
Hanifrahmawan Sudibyo, Budhijanto Budhijanto, Crispin Celis, Aqiela Mahannada, Ahmad Suparmin, Joko Wintoko, Dwi Joko Prasetyo, Muslih Anwar
Hydrothermal coliquefaction of anaerobically digested sewage sludge and polyphenols from agricultural residues yielded nearly nitrogen-free biocrude compatible with upgrading in oil refineries.
